recipe_name: Peachy Bread Pudding with Caramel Sauce
ingredients: 2 cups fresh peaches - peeled, pitted and halved, 1 (14 ounce) can sweetened condensed milk, 3  eggs, lightly beaten, 1   +   1/4 cups hot water,   +   1/4 cup butter, melted, 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, 1 teaspoon vanilla extract, 4 cups French bread, torn into small pieces
nutrition: Total Fat 20g 25%, Saturated Fat 12g 58%, Cholesterol 106mg 35%, Sodium 450mg 20%, Total Carbohydrate 61g 22%, Dietary Fiber 1g 4%, Total Sugars 36g, Protein 10g, Vitamin C 12mg 61%, Calcium 158mg 12%, Iron 2mg 11%, Potassium 249mg 5%
